name: Grimoire Noir
description:
the core ideas of my first game are seamless teleportation and being able to defy gravity on certain surfaces.

A methodical puzzle exploration game, in an impossible painting inspired labyrinth.

Grimoire Noir is an exploration puzzle game where you traverse a strange pocket dimension that is not bound to conventional laws of nature. Use these strange properties in combination with your own magic to solve puzzles.

music created by Vincent Clayton.

Vincent Clayton
